titleStmt.title: A sermon of the sacrami[n]t of the aulter made by a famouse doctoure called Fryderyke Nausea in Almayne and lately out of latyn translate into englysh by Iohn More
titleStmt.author: Nausea, Friedrich, d. 1552.
More, John, fl. 1533.

notesStmt.note: A translation, by John More, from the original Latin of Friedrich Nausea.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
